summary: A team of experts dispatched to bring in The Most Wanted Man in India almost achieve the unthinkable ... until something goes horribly wrong.
cast: Rishi Kapoor|Irrfan Khan|Arjun Rampal|Asif Silavat|Shruti Haasan|Huma Qureshi|Nassar|K.K. Raina|Chandan Roy Sanyal|Imran Hasnee|Nissar Khan|Sandeep Kulkarni|Aakash Dahiya|Divji Handa|Shriswara|Maryam Zakaria|Ashwin Dhar|Chettan Motiwalla|Rajpal Yadav|Manish Khanna|Pushpender Singh|Satyavrat Chakravarty|Savi Sidhu|Libert|Jayesh Tanna|Vinod Goswami|Raees|Kanika Dang|Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande|Sunil Singh|Arya Chaurasiya|Sanjay Gurbaxani|Padmesh|Ram Chandra Thakur|Manoj Sharma|Karan|Rashmi|Jehangir Karkaria|Pramod|Pathan|Mansoor|Ashraf|Shamsher|Naushad|Altaf|Omkar Kapoor|Mukesh Rathod|Kapil|Muzamil|Mukesh Singh|Niranjan Iyengar|Pawan Singh|Anitya Singh|Vinay Sharma|Garvita Sharma|Anil Maggu|Promod Ghosh|Amin Arif|Baba Khan|Niharika Jolly|Karishma Sharma|Shamsher|Rajendra Grover|Munawar Masoom|Raj|Usmaan|Raeez|Zoeb|Ismail|Yaseen|Nazeer|Neha|Taj Fakira|Lala Karim|Dhanraj Mallik|Mallik|Shahid Afridi|Hemang Dave|Rajkummar Rao
title: D-Day
